hero.title: Kumanga Kwabwino ku Cape Town
hero.subtitle: Ndi zaka za chidziwitso choposa 14, timapanga maziko osagwira, olimba komanso owoneka bwino kwa zomangamanga zanu zamkati ndi zakunja. Kuchokera pa ntchito za matope mpaka kusungitsa madzi, timayang'anira zonse zomangamanga zanu.

about.title: Ndondomeko ya Bizinesi
about.description: Kanguya builders inayamba ngati ogwira ntchito ya kontrakata mu 2010 ku Cape Town, South Africa, kuchita maprojekiti ang'onoang'ono omanga ku Cape Town. Kuchokera 2010-2018, Kanguya builders inkadziwika kuti Trust Builders. Kumapeto kwa 2018, Kanguya builders inasamukira ku Zambia kumene tinachita maprojekiti angapo omanga ndikusintha dzina lathu kukhala Kanguya Builders kuzungulira Lusaka mpaka 2021. Mu 2022, tinabwerera ku Cape Town, South Africa komwe tidakhazikika mokwanira ngati osewera amphamvu m'makampani omanga, tikuchita maprojekiti ang'onoang'ono ndi apakatikati, tikugwira ntchito za utsogoleri wa maprojekiti, tikunyambira ntchito zabwino kwambiri, ndi kupereka zotheka za uinjiniya wamalonda kwa makasitomala athu.
about.visionText: Kukhala anthu olemekezeka omanga komanso kupereka koposa zomwe akuyembekezera nthawi zonse ndikuthandizira ku dongosololi la chitukuko cha zomangamanga za Africa komanso kutenga gawo la kupanga ntchito kwa achinyamata a ku Africa.
about.philosophy: Nzeru Zathu za Utsogoleri wa Maprojekiti ndi Kuchita

philosophyPoints.safety: Kuonetsetsa chitetezo ndi chilengedwe cha ntchito pa malo a ntchito nthawi zonse
philosophyPoints.planning: Kupanga dongosolo latsatanetsatane ndi mapulani a zinthu kuti tikwaniritse zolinga za makasitomala athu
philosophyPoints.communication: Kulankhulana tsiku lililonse ndi onse okhudzidwa ndi projekiti
philosophyPoints.supervision: Kuyang'anira pafupi zabwino za ntchito yomwe yachitika
philosophyPoints.completion: Kumaliza ndi kuyambitsa maprojekiti mwa nthawi

services.title: Machitidwe Athu Omanga
services.subtitle: Zoyankha zathunthu za zomanga ndi kukonza kwatsopano ndi zaka za luso 14+
services.tilingDesc: Kuyika matayala mwaluso pa pansi, makoma, ndi m'mbuyo
services.plasteringDesc: Ntchito ya ukadaulo ya kupaka matope makoma amkati ndi akunja
services.brickworkDesc: Kumanga njerwa zabwino za mapangidwe ndi zokongoletsera
services.paintingDesc: Ntchito ya kupenta mkati ndi kunja ndi zomaliza zabwino
services.pavingDesc: Kupanga njira za galimoto ndi zoyenda ndi zinthu zolimba
services.plumbingDesc: Kuika ndi kukonza kwathunthu kwa mapaipi
services.carpentryDesc: Zinthu za matabwa zopangidwa bwino ndi zoyankha za senga

projects.title: Maprojekiti Athu Apadera
projects.subtitle: Kudzipereka kwathu ku ukadaulo, chidwi pa zatsatanetsatane, ndi kudzipereka kwathu kosalekeza kuonetsetsa kukhutitsidwa kwa makasitomala kukutisiyanitsa ngati chisankho choyamba cha zosowa zonse za zomanga ndi kukonza.

costEstimator.title: Chida Chowerera Mtengo
costEstimator.subtitle: Pezani kuyerekezera kwapang'ono kwa projekiti yanu yomanga. Lemberani zambiri za projekiti yanu pansipa kuti mulandire mtengo woyerekezeka potengera mitengo yathu yapano.
costEstimator.projectDetailsDesc: Perekani chidziwitso cha projekiti yanu kwa kuyerekezera mtengo
costEstimator.basic: Choyambira - Zinthu zachizolowezi ndi kapangidwe kaphweka
costEstimator.standard: Wanthawi zonse - Zinthu zabwino komanso kuvuta kokhazikika
costEstimator.premium: Wapamwamba - Zinthu zazikulu komanso kapangidwe kovuta
costEstimator.estimateDesc: Chida chathu chowerera mtengo chimapereka kuyerekezera kwapang'ono kutengera:
estimatePoints: Mitengo yapano ya msika wa zinthu ndi antchito
Kuvuta kwa projekiti ndi zofunika za ubwino
Zaka zathu za luso mu makampani 14+
costEstimator.importantNote: Chofunikira: Ichi ndi kuyerekezera kwapang'ono. Mitengo yokumalizira ikhoza kusiyana malinga ndi zofunika zenizeni, momwe malo aliri, kusankha zinthu, ndi mitengo yapano ya msika. Kuyandikirani kuti mupeze mtengo watsatanetsatane.
costEstimator.contactDesc: Kuyandikirani kuti mupeze mtengo watsatanetsatane ndi upangiri waukadaulo

gallery.title: Chiwonetsero cha Maprojekiti
gallery.subtitle: Fufuzani portfolio yathu ya maprojekiti omalizika. Onani ubwino wa ukadaulo ndi chidwi pa zatsatanetsatane zomwe zimasiyanitsa Kanguya Builders.

cta.title: Mukufuna Kuyamba Projekiti Yanu?
cta.subtitle: Tiloleni tikupangirani chinthu chodabwitsa inunso. Kuyandikirani kuti mupeze upangiri waulere ndi mtengo.

reviews.title: Ndemanga za Makasitomala ndi Umboni
reviews.subtitle: Werengani ndemanga zenizeni za makasitomala athu za zomwe anakumana nazo ndi Kanguya Builders. Ndemanga zanu zimatithandiza kusunga miyezo yathu yapamwamba komanso kumathandiza ena kupanga zisankho zodziwika bwino.

authentic.title: Ndemanga Zenizeni za Makasitomala
authentic.description: Ndemanga iliyonse ikuchokera kwa makasitomala enieni omwe akumana nawo machitidwe athu omanga mwachindunji.

contact.title: Kuyandikirani
contact.subtitle: Kuyandikirani kwa zosowa zanu za zomanga ndi kukonza
contact.name: Dzina Lathunthu
contact.subject: Mutu

quote.title: Pezani Mtengo Wanu Waulere Lero
quote.subtitle: Mukufuna kuyamba projekiti yanu yomanga kapena kukonza? Pezani mtengo wamakonda wanu wokwanira zosowa zanu.

footer.description: Mukulandiridwa ku Kanguya Builders, gwero lanu lodalirika la machitidwe apamwamba omanga ndi kukonza. Ndi zaka za luso zoposa 14 mu makampani omanga, timanyada kwambiri kupereka zoyankha zangwiro.
footer.copyright: Â© 2024 Kanguya Builders. Ufulu wonse wosungidwa. | Machitidwe Aukadaulo a Zomanga ndi Kukonza

reviewForm.title: Gawani Zomwe Munakumana Nazo
reviewForm.description: Thandizani ena pogawana zomwe munakumana nazo ndi Kanguya Builders. Ndemanga zanu zenizeni ndizofunika kwa ife ndi makasitomala amtsogolo.

success.title: Zikomo Chifukwa cha Ndemanga Yanu!
success.message: Ndemanga yanu yatumizidwa ndipo idzasindikizidwa pambuyo pa njira yathu yokunira. Timayamikira ndemanga zanu ndipo zimathandiza makasitomala ena kupanga zisankho zodziwika bwino.

form.reviewTitlePlaceholder: mwachitsanzo, Chithandizo chabwino ndi ntchito zabwino
form.reviewPlaceholder: Gawani zambiri za zomwe munakumana nazo ndi Kanguya Builders. Ndi chithandizo chanji chomwe munagwiritsa ntchito? Kodi ubwino, nthawi, ndi chithandizo cha makasitomala zinali bwanji?
form.recommendQuestion: Kodi mungalimbikitse Kanguya Builders kwa ena? *
